verses.verse: And the fifth<WG3991> angel<WG32> sounded,<WG4537> and I saw<WG1492> a star<WG792> fall<WG4098> from heaven<WG3772> to the earth:<WG1093> and to him was given<WG1325> the key<WG2807> of the bottomless<WG12> pit.<WG5421>

And he opened<WG455> the bottomless<WG12> pit;<WG5421> and there arose<WG305> a smoke<WG2586> out of the pit,<WG5421> as the smoke<WG2586> of a great<WG3173> furnace;<WG2575> and the sun<WG2246> and the air<WG109> were darkened<WG4654> by reason<WG1537> of the smoke<WG2586> of the pit.<WG5421>

And there came<WG1831> out of the smoke<WG2586> locusts<WG200> on the earth:<WG1093> and to them was given<WG1325> power,<WG1849> as the scorpions<WG4651> of the earth<WG1093> have<WG2192> power.<WG1849>

And it was commanded<WG4483> them that they should not hurt<WG91> the grass<WG5528> of the earth,<WG1093> neither any<WG3956> green<WG5515> thing, neither any<WG3956> tree;<WG1186> but only<WG3441> those<WG3588> men<WG444> which<WG3748> have<WG2192> not the seal<WG4973> of God<WG2316> in their foreheads.<WG3359>

And to them it was given<WG1325> that they should not kill<WG615> them, but that they should be tormented<WG928> five<WG4002> months:<WG3376> and their torment<WG929> was as the torment<WG929> of a scorpion,<WG4651> when<WG3752> he strikes<WG3817> a man.<WG444>
And in those<WG1565> days<WG2250> shall men<WG444> seek<WG2212> death,<WG2288> and shall not find<WG2147> it; and shall desire<WG1937> to die,<WG599> and death<WG2288> shall flee<WG5343> from them.

And the shapes<WG3667> of the locusts<WG200> were like<WG3664> to horses<WG2462> prepared<WG2090> to battle;<WG4171> and on<WG1909> their heads<WG2776> were as it were crowns<WG4735> like<WG3664> gold,<WG5557> and their faces<WG4383> were as the faces<WG4383> of men.<WG444>
And they had<WG2192> hair<WG2359> as the hair<WG2359> of women,<WG1135> and their teeth<WG3599> were as the teeth of lions.<WG3023>

And they had<WG2192> breastplates,<WG2382> as it were breastplates<WG2382> of iron;<WG4603> and the sound<WG5456> of their wings<WG4420> was as the sound<WG5456> of chariots<WG716> of many<WG4183> horses<WG2462> running<WG5143> to battle.<WG4171>

And they had<WG2192> tails<WG3769> like<WG3664> to scorpions,<WG4651> and there were stings<WG2759> in their tails:<WG3769> and their power<WG1849> was to hurt<WG91> men<WG444> five<WG4002> months.<WG3376>

And they had<WG2192> a king<WG935> over<WG1909> them, which is the angel<WG32> of the bottomless<WG12> pit, whose<WG846> name<WG3686> in the Hebrew<WG1447> tongue<WG1447> is Abaddon,<WG3> but in the Greek<WG1673> tongue has<WG2192> his name<WG3686> Apollyon.<WG623>
One<WG3391> woe<WG3759> is past;<WG565> and, behold,<WG2400> there come<WG2064> two<WG1417> woes<WG3759> more<WG2089> hereafter.<WG3326> <WG5023>

And the sixth<WG1623> angel<WG32> sounded,<WG4537> and I heard<WG191> a voice<WG5456> from the four<WG5064> horns<WG2768> of the golden<WG5552> altar<WG2379> which<WG3588> is before<WG1799> God,<WG2316>

Saying<WG3004> to the sixth<WG1623> angel<WG32> which<WG3739> had<WG2192> the trumpet,<WG4536> Loose<WG3089> the four<WG5064> angels<WG32> which<WG3588> are bound<WG1210> in the great<WG3173> river<WG4215> Euphrates.<WG2166>

And the four<WG5064> angels<WG32> were loosed,<WG3089> which<WG3588> were prepared<WG2090> for an hour,<WG5610> and a day,<WG2250> and a month,<WG3376> and a year,<WG1763> for to slay<WG615> the third<WG5154> part of men.<WG444>
And the number<WG706> of the army<WG4753> of the horsemen<WG2461> were two<WG1417> hundred<WG3461> thousand<WG3461> thousand:<WG3461> and I heard<WG191> the number<WG706> of them.

And thus<WG3779> I saw<WG1492> the horses<WG2462> in the vision,<WG3706> and them that sat<WG2521> on<WG1909> them, having<WG2192> breastplates<WG2382> of fire,<WG4447> and of jacinth,<WG5191> and brimstone:<WG2306> and the heads<WG2776> of the horses<WG2462> were as the heads<WG2776> of lions;<WG3023> and out of their mouths<WG4750> issued<WG1607> fire<WG4442> and smoke<WG2586> and brimstone.<WG2303>

By these<WG5130> three<WG5140> was the third<WG5154> part of men<WG444> killed,<WG615> by the fire,<WG4442> and by the smoke,<WG2586> and by the brimstone,<WG2303> which<WG3588> issued<WG1607> out of their mouths.<WG4750>

For their power<WG1849> is in their mouth,<WG4750> and in their tails:<WG3769> for their tails<WG3769> were like<WG3664> to serpents,<WG3789> and had<WG2192> heads,<WG2776> and with them they do hurt.<WG91>

And the rest<WG3062> of the men<WG444> which<WG3739> were not killed<WG615> by these<WG5025> plagues<WG4127> yet repented<WG3340> not of the works<WG2041> of their hands,<WG5495> that they should not worship<WG4352> devils,<WG1140> and idols<WG1497> of gold,<WG5552> and silver,<WG693> and brass,<WG5470> and stone,<WG3035> and of wood:<WG3585> which<WG3739> neither<WG3777> can<WG1410> see,<WG991> nor<WG3777> hear,<WG191> nor<WG3777> walk:<WG4043>
Neither<WG2532> <WG3756> repented<WG3340> they of their murders,<WG5408> nor<WG3777> of their sorceries,<WG5331> nor<WG3777> of their fornication,<WG4202> nor<WG3777> of their thefts.<WG2809>
